introduction: The series takes place in a nice little village Farmington and follows an everyday life of an intelligent boy Mr.Theo. With the help of a cunning and practical Sailor the cat and an enthusiastic Mutt the dog, Mr.Theo manages the household and the dairy, while the local troublemaker, the grumpy postman MacGrouchy will stop at nothing to cause them trouble. To make things worse Mr.Theo's parents hire an opinionated and strict nanny Ms.Meguera to look after little Vera. Mr.Theo and his friends have to cope with both MacGrouchy and the nasty nanny and also continue dealing with funny daily challenges to restore the piece of their rural lifestyle.
